page.title: 20Acknowledgements
page.content: Most of the local history material was taken from booklets "West Chiltington in the County of Sussex", and "West Chiltington in West Sussex" (reprinted 1984), by Sylvia Saunders-Jacobs; and "The History of Shipley", by M.M. Hickman (1947). We thank the farmers and nurserymen, home-owners, their wives and families, who patiently answered many questions and provided information; also staff at the Weald School, Billingshurst, and West Chiltington and Coolham Primary Schools, who were so helpful. Special thanks are due to Mr Breach, Headmaster of the C. of E. Primary School, Ashington, and to Mr and Mrs Daniels, teachers of Henfield, who allowed us to use their computers and gave us much encouragement. Also to those members of West Chiltington W.I. who helped and walked local footpaths.
